title: What is the newest type of transportation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Original question: What is the newest type of transportation? Here there are just a few: Hyperloop:Is a sealed tube or system of tubes with low air pressure through which a pod may travel substantially free of air resistance or friction. The Hyperloop could convey people or objects at airline or hypersonic speeds while being very energy efficient. Autonomous Flight Drones (with passengers)Take my money, take me home.  New Generation Maglev Trains+600 Km/h Maglev from China (Not actually a new type, but a big leap forward on an existing type) Level 5 - Full Automation Cars:No more steering wheel, just seat and relax until you get to your destination.  SpaceX Starship with reusable propulsion rockets.A new kind of space shuttle this time with reusable rockets will make space travel more affordable. Space tourism will be possible and will look like this:
